meanings.definition: A group of people joined together for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The bandings of friends worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The bandings of volunteers made a difference in the community.
meanings.sent3: The bandings of classmates organized a surprise party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The bandings of superheroes united to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent5: The bandings of neighbors helped each other during the storm.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a band or group.
meanings.sent1: Her bandings with fellow musicians led to the creation of a new band.
meanings.sent2: The bandings for the school talent show started early in the semester.
meanings.sent3: The bandings for the dance competition began with auditions.
meanings.sent4: His bandings with other artists resulted in a successful music album.
meanings.sent5: The bandings for the charity event brought together talented performers.

meanings.definition: Stripes or lines of different colors or materials arranged in a pattern.
meanings.sent1: The curtains had beautiful bandings of gold and silver threads.
meanings.sent2: The dress was adorned with intricate bandings along the hem.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with colorful bandings made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The flag had bandings of red, white, and blue representing the country.
meanings.sent5: The artwork featured unique bandings that caught the eye of the viewers.
